record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2483
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2483 -- (Senate - December 14, 2007)

[Page: S15706]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I understand that S. 2483 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2483) to authorize certain programs and activities in the Forest Service, the Department of the Interior, and the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to this legislation.

record.chair: Objection is heard, and the bill is placed on the calendar under rule XIV.
